${ModID}:attackCard.NAME: Unused
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL

${ModID}:foresightAttack.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightAttack.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Attack.

${ModID}:foresightSkill.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightSkill.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Skill.

${ModID}:foresightPower.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:foresightPower.DESCRIPTION: Guess that the card drawn is an Power.

${ModID}:EmptyThreat.NAME: EmptyThreat
${ModID}:EmptyThreat.DESCRIPTION: Force the enemy to defend if possible. NL If the enemy is already defending, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:PlayfulTaunt.NAME: Playful Taunt
${ModID}:PlayfulTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Force the enemy to attack if possible.

${ModID}:PressRelease.NAME: Press Release
${ModID}:PressRelease.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Copy a *Photograph in your hand.

${ModID}:WidespreadPropaganda.NAME: Widespread Propaganda
${ModID}:WidespreadPropaganda.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Photograph would deal damage to a single target, deal that damage to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:DoctoredImage.NAME: Doctored Image
${ModID}:DoctoredImage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a *Photograph in your hand.
${ModID}:DoctoredImage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a *Photograph in your hand twice.

${ModID}:PhotographicDisposal.NAME: Photographic Disposal
${ModID}:PhotographicDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw !M! cards. NL If you would discard a *Photograph, Exhaust it instead, and gain !${ModID}:M! Strength.

${ModID}:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
${ModID}:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Choose a type of card. NL Draw !${ModID}:M! card. NL If that card was that type, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard up to !${ModID}:M! cards.

${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.NAME: Whispers Of The Wind
${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard a card at random.
${ModID}:WhispersOfTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:Opportunity.NAME: Opportunity
${ModID}:Opportunity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:M! card. If target intends to not attack this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Photocopier.NAME: Photocopier
${ModID}:Photocopier.DESCRIPTION: Select a card in your deck. Add a copy of it to your deck. Gain [E] and Draw !M! card for every !${ModID}:M! copies of that card in your deck.

${ModID}:TenguGaleBullet.NAME: Tengu Gale Bullet
${ModID}:TenguGaleBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When discarded, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Persuade.NAME: Persuade
${ModID}:Persuade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Force target enemy not to attack if possible.

${ModID}:GustFan.NAME: Gust Fan
${ModID}:GustFan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL If target enemy intends to attack, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:ReporterInstinct.NAME: Reporter's Instinct
${ModID}:ReporterInstinct.DESCRIPTION: If target intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:AirCutter.NAME: Air Cutter
${ModID}:AirCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !${ModID}:M! card.

${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.NAME: Sudden Outburst
${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and ${ModID}:Snapshot a random enemy.
${ModID}:SuddenOutburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and L ${ModID}:Snapshot+ a random enemy.

${ModID}:PeerlessWind.NAME: Peerless Wind
${ModID}:PeerlessWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Adaptive: NL Draw !M! cards. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.
